preguntas.informacion:
Java tiene 8 tipos primitivos:
- byte (8 bits)
- short (16 bits)
- int (32 bits)
- long (64 bits)
- float (32 bits)
- double (64 bits)
- char (16 bits)
- boolean (1 bit)
